title: Portobello mushroom pie
ingredients: ['1 packet shortcrust pastry', '6 small red potatoes', '3 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '150g sliced onion', '150g thinly sliced fresh shiitake mushrooms', '825ml water', '60ml soy sauce', '5 tablespoons rice flour', '2 portobello mushrooms, cut into bite size pieces', '1 teaspoon dried thyme', '2 teaspoons dried sage', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '1 carrot, cubed']
